meanings.definition: Following in time or order; succeeding.
meanings.sent1: The subsequents chapters of the book continued the exciting story.
meanings.sent2: The subsequent movie in the series was even more thrilling.
meanings.sent3: The subsequents puppies in the litter were all playful and adorable.
meanings.sent4: The subsequents waves crashed against the shore with relentless force.
meanings.sent5: The subsequents days of summer seemed to stretch on forever.

meanings.definition: Something that follows; a subsequent event or action.
meanings.sent1: After the main event, the subsequents were just as entertaining.
meanings.sent2: The subsequents of the meeting were not as productive as expected.
meanings.sent3: The subsequents of the magic trick left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The subsequents of the story unfolded like a carefully crafted puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The subsequents of the experiment revealed unexpected results.
